name: Diagnosis Bot
description: Chatbot analyse user's cyber security issues and offer a diagnosis

request_intents.name: intent.app.welcomeResponseForWebchat
request_intents.speaker: APP
request_intents.sample_utterance: Welcome and do you agree to terms and conditions?

message_templates.name: Welcome Message
message_templates.message_markup:
<message disable_text="true" hide_avatar="false"><text-message>Hi</text-message><text-message>Welcome to The Cyber Helpline Chatbot - I'm a robot.</text-message><text-message>Sorry to hear you have been a victim of cyber crime. I will do all I can to help.</text-message><text-message>My job is to identify what has happened to you and point you in the right direction to get help.</text-message><text-message>Once you have told me your issue I will either send you to a web page with a guide that will help – or I will take your details and get one of our experts to get in touch to help.</text-message><text-message>If I send you to a guide – and you have a specific question that isn't answered there - you still have the chance to speak to an expert.</text-message><text-message>When my chat window opens up on the guide page just click 'I need more help'.</text-message><text-message>If you feel you are in danger contact the police and continue our chat when you are safe.</text-message><text-message>Please review our terms and conditions of use <a target="_blank" href="https://www.thecyberhelpline.com/chatbot-terms-conditions-of-use">here</a></text-message><button-message clear_after_interaction="1">
        <text>Do you accept the terms and conditions of use?</text>
        <external>true</external>
        <button>
          <text>Yes</text>
          <callback>AgreeTerms</callback>
          <value>agree_terms.1</value>
        </button>
        <button>
          <text>No</text>
          <callback>NotAgreeTerms</callback>
          <value>agree_terms.0</value>
        </button>
        
      </button-message></message>

request_intents.name: ReportedToPolice
request_intents.speaker: APP
request_intents.sample_utterance: Have you reported the incident to the police?

message_templates.name: reported to police
message_templates.message_markup:
<message disable_text="false" hide_avatar="false"><button-message clear_after_interaction="0">
        <text>Have you already reported your issue to the police? This might have been through a police website like ActionFraud or at your local police station.</text>
        <external>true</external>
        <button>
          <text>Yes</text>
          <callback>ReportedToPolice</callback>
          <value>reported_to_police.1</value>
        </button>
        <button>
          <text>No</text>
          <callback>ReportedToPolice</callback>
          <value>reported_to_police.0</value>
        </button>
        
      </button-message></message>

message_templates.name: Get Started Message
message_templates.message_markup:
<message disable_text="false" hide_avatar="false"><button-message clear_after_interaction="0">
        <text>Ok, lets get started. Ready?</text>
        <external>true</external>
        <button>
          <text>Ready.</text>
          <callback>ReadyToStart</callback>
          <value>diagnosis_started.yes</value>
        </button>
        
      </button-message></message>

message_templates.name: auto generated
message_templates.message_markup: <message disable_text="false" hide_avatar="false"><text-message>Sorry, I didn't understand that</text-message></message>

message_templates.name: Diagnosis Request Message
message_templates.message_markup:
<message disable_text="true" hide_avatar="false"><long-text-message>
  <submit_text>Send</submit_text>
  <callback>Diagnose</callback>
  <placeholder>Tell me what happened in your own words</placeholder>
  <confirmation_text>Do you want to submit?</confirmation_text>
  <character_limit>100</character_limit>
  <initial_text>{user.diagnosis_text}</initial_text>
  <text>Please tell me what has happened? Try and provide as much information as possible without sharing any private information like passwords or account numbers.
    
    
   Remember, if you have a specific question that isn't answered in the guide you can use the chat window on the guide page to ask for help from one of our human experts.</text>
  <attribute_name>diagnosis_text</attribute_name>
</long-text-message></message>

message_templates.name: No Diagnosis found
message_templates.message_markup:
<message disable_text="true" hide_avatar="false"><text-message>Thanks for sharing your problem. Unfortunately, we have been unable to conclusively identify the problem.</text-message><button-message clear_after_interaction="1">
        <text>You could change your initial description to add more information, start over with a new description or get in touch with one of our volunteer cyber security experts.</text>
        <external>false</external>
        <button>
          <text>I want to start over</text>
          <callback>StartDiagnosis</callback>
          
        </button>
        <button>
          <text>Ok, I want to edit my description</text>
          <callback>EditDiagnosis</callback>
          
        </button>
        <button>
          <text>No thanks, I would like to talk to a volunteer cyber security expert</text>
          <callback>speakToExpert</callback>
          
        </button>
        
      </button-message></message>

request_intents.name: DisplayResult
request_intents.speaker: APP
request_intents.sample_utterance: Is this part of your issue?

message_templates.name: First guess attack message (no related attaacks)
message_templates.message_markup:
<message disable_text="true" hide_avatar="false"><text-message>Thanks for sharing your problem. Our automated analysis indicated that you most likely have been the victim of {user.attack_name}</text-message><text-message>{user.attack_clarifying_text}</text-message><button-message clear_after_interaction="0">
        <text>Does that sound like your issue?</text>
        <external>true</external>
        <button>
          <text>Yes</text>
          <callback>ConfirmAttack</callback>
          
        </button>
        <button>
          <text>No</text>
          <callback>DenyAttack</callback>
          
        </button>
        
      </button-message></message>

message_templates.name: Second guess attack message (no related attacks)
message_templates.message_markup:
<message disable_text="true" hide_avatar="false"><text-message>Looks like our previous analysis was not a good fit. The next most likely things to have happened for our system is {user.attack_name}</text-message><text-message>{user.attack_clarifying_text}</text-message><button-message clear_after_interaction="0">
        <text>Does that sound like your issue?</text>
        <external>false</external>
        <button>
          <text>Yes</text>
          <callback>ConfirmAttack</callback>
          
        </button>
        <button>
          <text>No</text>
          <callback>DenyAttack</callback>
          
        </button>
        
      </button-message></message>

message_templates.name: First guess attack message
message_templates.message_markup:
<message disable_text="true" hide_avatar="false"><text-message>Thanks for sharing your problem. Our automated analysis indicated that you most likely have been the victim of {user.attack_name}</text-message><text-message>{user.attack_clarifying_text}</text-message><button-message clear_after_interaction="0">
        <text>Does this sound like part of your issue?</text>
        <external>false</external>
        <button>
          <text>Yes</text>
          <callback>ConfirmAttack</callback>
          
        </button>
        <button>
          <text>No</text>
          <callback>DenyAttack</callback>
          
        </button>
        
      </button-message></message>

message_templates.name: Second guess attack message
message_templates.message_markup:
<message disable_text="true" hide_avatar="false"><text-message>Looks like our previous analysis was not a good fit. The next most likely things to have happened for our system is {user.attack_name}</text-message><text-message>{user.attack_clarifying_text}</text-message><button-message clear_after_interaction="0">
        <text>Does this sound like part of your issue?</text>
        <external>false</external>
        <button>
          <text>Yes</text>
          <callback>ConfirmAttack</callback>
          
        </button>
        <button>
          <text>No</text>
          <callback>DenyAttack</callback>
          
        </button>
        
      </button-message></message>

response_intents.name: ConfirmAttack
response_intents.speaker: USER
response_intents.sample_utterance: Yes, this is part of my issue

response_intents.name: DenyAttack
response_intents.speaker: USER
response_intents.sample_utterance: No, this is not part of my issue

request_intents.name: ShowRelatedAttack
request_intents.speaker: APP
request_intents.sample_utterance: Show next related attack. Is this part of your issue?

message_templates.name: show related attacks message
message_templates.message_markup:
<message disable_text="false" hide_avatar="false"><text-message>There are {user.related_attack_count} other attacks are potentially involved</text-message><text-message>The {user.related_attack_number} is {user.related_attack_name}</text-message><text-message>{user.related_attack_clarifying_text}</text-message><button-message clear_after_interaction="0">
        <text>Does this sound like part of your issue?</text>
        <external>true</external>
        <button>
          <text>Yes</text>
          <callback>ConfirmRelatedAttack</callback>
          
        </button>
        <button>
          <text>No</text>
          <callback>RejectRelatedAttack</callback>
          
        </button>
        
      </button-message></message>

response_intents.name: ConfirmRelatedAttack
response_intents.speaker: USER
response_intents.sample_utterance: Yes, this is part of my issue

response_intents.name: RejectRelatedAttack
response_intents.speaker: USER
response_intents.sample_utterance: No, this is not part of my issue

message_templates.name: No related attacks
message_templates.message_markup: <message disable_text="false" hide_avatar="false"><empty-message/></message>

request_intents.name: SeeRelatedAttacks
request_intents.speaker: APP
request_intents.sample_utterance: Would you like to see related attacks?

message_templates.name: Would you like to see related (first message)
message_templates.message_markup:
<message disable_text="false" hide_avatar="false"><text-message>Thanks for your clear description. I am glad I was able to identify the problem.</text-message><button-message clear_after_interaction="0">
        <text>During our analysis, some other attacks also scored highly. Would you like to review these other attacks now to see if they are part of your issue?</text>
        <external>false</external>
        <button>
          <text>Yes, let me take a look now</text>
          <callback>ShowRelatedAttacks</callback>
          
        </button>
        <button>
          <text>No, let's fix the issue you've highlighted</text>
          <callback>DoNotShowRelated</callback>
          
        </button>
        
      </button-message></message>

message_templates.name: Would you like to see related (after first message)
message_templates.message_markup:
<message disable_text="false" hide_avatar="false"><button-message clear_after_interaction="0">
        <text>Do you want to see the remaining related attacks?</text>
        <external>true</external>
        <button>
          <text>Yes</text>
          <callback>ShowRelatedAttacks</callback>
          
        </button>
        <button>
          <text>No</text>
          <callback>DoNotShowRelated</callback>
          
        </button>
        
      </button-message></message>

response_intents.name: DoNotShowRelated
response_intents.speaker: USER
response_intents.sample_utterance: No, do not show related attacks

message_templates.name: auto generated
message_templates.message_markup:
<message disable_text="true" hide_avatar="false"><form-message>
  <text>Please enter a valid email address</text>
  <submit_text>Send</submit_text>
  <callback>ProvideEmailAddress</callback>

  <element>
    <element_type>email</element_type>
    <name>email_address</name>
  </element>
</form-message></message>

turns.name: Would you like to provide email?

request_intents.name: ProvideEmail
request_intents.speaker: APP
request_intents.sample_utterance: Would you like to provide your email address?

message_templates.name: Provide Email
message_templates.message_markup:
<message disable_text="false" hide_avatar="false"><text-message>One of our volunteers reviews a sample of our chatbot's recommendations on a regular basis.</text-message><text-message>If we review yours and think we can give more tailored - or different - advice we would like to be able to get in touch.</text-message><button-message clear_after_interaction="0">
        <text>Would you like to provide an email address for us to get in touch if need be?</text>
        <external>true</external>
        <button>
          <text>Yes</text>
          <callback>ProvideEmail</callback>
          
        </button>
        <button>
          <text>No</text>
          <callback>DoNotProvideEmail</callback>
          
        </button>
        
      </button-message></message>

request_intents.name: NotAcceptTerms
request_intents.speaker: APP
request_intents.sample_utterance: Sorry, please get in touch again if you have other issues

message_templates.name: auto generated
message_templates.message_markup:
<message disable_text="true" hide_avatar="false"><text-message>
Sorry you are unhappy with our terms. You may be able to find a solution to your issue on our   <link new_tab="true">
    <url>https://www.thecyberhelpline.com</url>
    <text>guides page</text>
  </link>
</text-message><button-message clear_after_interaction="0">
        <text>Please get in touch again if you have any other issues.</text>
        <external>true</external>
        <button>
          <text>Describe a new issue</text>
          <callback>intent.core.restart</callback>
          
        </button>
        
      </button-message></message>

request_intents.name: end
request_intents.speaker: APP
request_intents.sample_utterance: This is the end of the bot so faer

message_templates.name: auto generated
message_templates.message_markup: <message disable_text="false" hide_avatar="false"><text-message>This is the end of the bot so faer</text-message></message>

request_intents.name: speakToExpert
request_intents.speaker: USER
request_intents.sample_utterance: I want to speak to an expert

message_templates.name: ask first name
message_templates.message_markup:
<message disable_text="true" hide_avatar="false"><text-message>Ok, I am going to contact our human helpline service and have them get in touch.</text-message><text-message>By using the human helpline service you agree to these <a target="blank" href="https://www.thecyberhelpline.com/helpline-terms-conditions-of-use">terms & conditions</a></text-message><text-message>I need a few details first.</text-message><form-message>
        <text>Can you tell me your first name?</text>
        <submit_text>Submit</submit_text>
        <callback>provideName</callback>
        
        
        <element>
          <element_type>text</element_type>
          <name>firsrt_name</name>
          <display></display>
          
          <default_value>{user.first_name}</default_value>
          <required>true</required>
        </element>
      </form-message></message>

message_templates.name: ask email
message_templates.message_markup:
<message disable_text="true" hide_avatar="false"><text-message>Can you give me an email address?</text-message><form-message>
        <text>Please provide one that is secure.</text>
        <submit_text>Submit</submit_text>
        <callback>provideEmail</callback>
        
        
        <element>
          <element_type>email</element_type>
          <name>email</name>
          <display></display>
          
          <default_value>{user.email}</default_value>
          <required>true</required>
        </element>
      </form-message></message>

message_templates.name: Ask Phone Number
message_templates.message_markup:
<message disable_text="true" hide_avatar="false"><text-message>What is the best phone number to reach you on?</text-message><form-message>
        <text>Again provide one you think is secure.</text>
        <submit_text>Submit</submit_text>
        <callback>providePhoneNumber</callback>
        
        
        <element>
          <element_type>text</element_type>
          <name>phone_number</name>
          <display></display>
          
          
          <required>true</required>
        </element>
      </form-message></message>

request_intents.name: inDanger
request_intents.speaker: APP
request_intents.sample_utterance: Do you feel in any immediate physical danger?

message_templates.name: in danger question
message_templates.message_markup:
<message disable_text="false" hide_avatar="false"><button-message clear_after_interaction="0">
        <text>Do you feel in any immediate physical danger?</text>
        <external>true</external>
        <button>
          <text>Yes</text>
          <callback>inDangerResponse</callback>
          <value>immediate_danger.1</value>
        </button>
        <button>
          <text>No</text>
          <callback>inDangerResponse</callback>
          <value>immediate_danger.0</value>
        </button>
        
      </button-message></message>

message_templates.name: Over 18 Message
message_templates.message_markup:
<message disable_text="false" hide_avatar="false"><button-message clear_after_interaction="1">
        <text>Are you over 18</text>
        <external>true</external>
        <button>
          <text>Yes</text>
          <callback>over18Answer</callback>
          <value>over_18.1</value>
        </button>
        <button>
          <text>No</text>
          <callback>over18Answer</callback>
          <value>over_18.0</value>
        </button>
        
      </button-message></message>

request_intents.name: accountsUsed
request_intents.speaker: APP
request_intents.sample_utterance: Any other accounts or devices used?

message_templates.name: auto generated
message_templates.message_markup:
<message disable_text="false" hide_avatar="false"><button-message clear_after_interaction="1">
        <text>Are any devices or accounts that you use - like work or university owned accounts or devices - involved in your issue?</text>
        <external>true</external>
        <button>
          <text>Yes</text>
          <callback>answerAccountsUsed</callback>
          <value>other_accounts.1</value>
        </button>
        <button>
          <text>No</text>
          <callback>answerAccountsUsed</callback>
          <value>other_accounts.1</value>
        </button>
        
      </button-message></message>

message_templates.name: Are you in the UK
message_templates.message_markup:
<message disable_text="false" hide_avatar="false"><button-message clear_after_interaction="1">
        <text>Are you currently in the United Kingdom?</text>
        <external>true</external>
        <button>
          <text>Yes</text>
          <callback>answerInUk</callback>
          <value>in_uk.1</value>
        </button>
        <button>
          <text>No</text>
          <callback>answerInUk</callback>
          <value>in_uk.0</value>
        </button>
        
      </button-message></message>

request_intents.name: optIn
request_intents.speaker: APP
request_intents.sample_utterance: Would you like to Opt In?

message_templates.name: auto generated
message_templates.message_markup: <message disable_text="false" hide_avatar="false"><text-message>Would you like to Opt In?</text-message></message>

message_templates.name: chat end
message_templates.message_markup: <message disable_text="true" hide_avatar="false"><text-message>Thanks, I have stored your preference. </text-message><text-message>If you would like to change your preference at a later date please follow the steps in our <a href="https://www.thecyberhelpline.com/privacy-policy" target="_blank">Privacy Policy.</a></text-message></message>
